changeSet.author: blcmigration (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BLC_PAGE_FLD AS A SET PAGE_ID = B.PAGE_ID FROM BLC_PAGE_FLD_MAP AS B WHERE B.PAGE_FLD_ID = A.PAGE_FLD_ID;

changeSet.author: blcmigration (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BLC_SC_FLD_MAP set BLC_SC_SC_FIELD_ID = rows.new_sid from (select BLC_SC_SC_FIELD_ID, rank() over (order BY SC_FLD_ID) as new_sid, SC_FLD_ID from BLC_SC_FLD_MAP) as rows where rows.SC_FLD_ID = BLC_SC_FLD_MAP.SC_FLD_ID;

changeSet.author: blcmigration (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BLC_TAR_CRIT_OFFER_XREF set OFFER_TAR_CRIT_ID = rows.new_sid from (select OFFER_TAR_CRIT_ID, rank() over (order BY OFFER_ITEM_CRITERIA_ID) as new_sid, OFFER_ITEM_CRITERIA_ID from BLC_TAR_CRIT_OFFER_XREF) as rows where rows.OFFER_ITEM_CRITERIA_ID = BLC_TAR_CRIT_OFFER_XREF.OFFER_ITEM_CRITERIA_ID;

changeSet.author: blcmigration (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BLC_PGTMPLT_FLDGRP_XREF set PG_TMPLT_FLD_GRP_ID = rows.new_sid from (select PG_TMPLT_FLD_GRP_ID, rank() over (order BY PAGE_TMPLT_ID, GROUP_ORDER, FLD_GROUP_ID) as new_sid, PAGE_TMPLT_ID from BLC_PGTMPLT_FLDGRP_XREF) as rows where rows.PAGE_TMPLT_ID = BLC_PGTMPLT_FLDGRP_XREF.PAGE_TMPLT_ID;

changeSet.author: blcmigration (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BLC_SKU_MEDIA_MAP set SKU_MEDIA_ID = rows.new_sid from (select SKU_MEDIA_ID, rank() over (order BY MEDIA_ID) as new_sid, MEDIA_ID from BLC_SKU_MEDIA_MAP) as rows where rows.MEDIA_ID = BLC_SKU_MEDIA_MAP.MEDIA_ID;

changeSet.author: blcmigration (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BLC_SKU_OPTION_VALUE_XREF set SKU_OPTION_VALUE_XREF_ID = rows.new_sid from (select SKU_ID, rank() over (order BY SKU_ID, PRODUCT_OPTION_VALUE_ID) as new_sid, PRODUCT_OPTION_VALUE_ID from BLC_SKU_OPTION_VALUE_XREF) as rows where rows.SKU_ID = BLC_SKU_OPTION_VALUE_XREF.SKU_ID AND rows.PRODUCT_OPTION_VALUE_ID = BLC_SKU_OPTION_VALUE_XREF.PRODUCT_OPTION_VALUE_ID;
